description:
Major League Baseball (MLB) player Albert Pujols has hit 698 career home runs, 19 of which were struck in the 2022 regular season. The 2022 MLB regular season is scheduled to end on October 5, 2022. Only 3 MLB players, Barry Bonds, Hank Aaron, and Babe Ruth, have hit 700 career home runs so far. Pujols stands a chance of becoming a fourth member of the rarefied 700 Club before the end of the 2022 MLB regular season.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Albert Pujols reaches 700 career home runs by the end of the 2022 MLB regular season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the MLB reports Albert Pujols has reached 700 career home runs by the end of the 2022 regular season, this market will resolve immediately, regardless of whether it later revises its figures.

This market may resolve as soon as the St. Louis Cardinals plays and completes their final scheduled game in the 2022 MLB regular season.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the MLB (ex: https://www.mlb.com/stats/home-runs/all-time-totals).
